title: Las Pitaz
typeOfFood: Ovo, Mediterranean, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Greek, Moroccan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves Middle Eastern fast food including falafel plates/sandwiches, hummus bowls and tabouli salad. Variety of salads or veggies to add to bowls like Moroccan carrot salad, cauliflower salad, and roasted red bell pepper salad. Has plenty of vegan choices.
streetAddress: Av Pastor Diaz, Plaza Las Americas
